TopicTitle: Tracking Station Should Use Research Lab Organization Style?

Articles.Content:
Suggestion posed through a picture: Organize your ships by planet/moon:

![EJrGpRc.png](http://i.imgur.com/EJrGpRc.png)

[http://i.imgur.com/EJrGpRc.png](http://i.imgur.com/EJrGpRc.png)

Oh man! This is a brilliant idea!

I've always disliked how cluttered the tracking station was, but it never occurred to me that that problem could be solved.

Yes. By midgame its clutered with orbiters for every joolian body, orbiters and landers for eve/duna, not to mention local missions.

I support Tracking Station reform.

Awesome idea!

Also, they should rename it Mission Control, since Mission Control tracks/operates current missions in flight. Their "mission control" is a contract office or something, it has nothing to do with current missions in flight.

Oh this would come in incredibly handy, yet no one though of it before lol.

10/10 would love to see it in the game.

+Rep given!
One of many UI improvements I would like in 1.1. Any time Squad says they're trying to remake the UI exactly it hurts my heart.

Overall fully agree remaking the same mistakes as they update to Unity5 UI just because that's how it was done would be a colossal let down.
